data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jameson, Mary Liz, Drumont, Alain (2013): Aroid scarabs in the genus Peltonotus Burmeister (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae, Dynastinae): key to species and new distributional data. ZooKeys 320: 63-95, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.320.5352, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.320.5352
